name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Experienced Senior Application Engineer with a strong foundation in secure coding, Bug Bounty, and Pentesting. Proficient in utilizing tools such as **OWASP**, **Burp Suite**, **SAST**, **DAST**, **SonarQube**, **Snyk**, **Jenkins**, **GitLabCI**, **Terraform**, and **Helm** to implement robust security measures and enhance application security. Skilled in CI/CD methodologies to ensure seamless deployment and integration processes.

As a Full Stack Developer with 13+ years of experience, I have a history of delivering high-performance applications in the healthcare and financial sectors. I am proficient in **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, with hands-on expertise in both frontend and backend development using **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. My background includes building AI/ML-powered platforms for predictive analytics, automation, and real-time processing.

I have extensive experience in cloud-native systems deployment on **AWS** and **Azure**, implementing microservices, event-driven architectures, and CI/CD pipelines. Additionally, I understand compliance-driven development, aligning solutions with HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2 standards, and have a strong background in MLOps, including model training, serving, and orchestration using **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**. My problem-solving capabilities and effective communication skills have been instrumental in collaborating with teams to achieve successful project outcomes.
